header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Dinner, Mick (children’s TV programme ‘Stick with Mick’), Friends, What to do in the summer holidays in the day, Trying to understand what ANON is saying, Japanese, Practising guitar, Swimming, Doing jobs around the house.
header.activity: Dinner with son talking about what to do during the day of summer holidays.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, advising, requesting, inviting, making arrangements, apologizing

speaker.occupation: not currently working, caring for toddler
